Boris Brejcha, Armin van Buuren & More to Perform at ELEVATION 002

Posted by Brittany Prevost on September 28, 2022

TICKETS

The pandemic certainly put a pause on many of our dance music related plans. That said, that didn't stop us from fully taking advantage of this year's events once the restrictions lifted. Although festival season is already coming to an end, there's one event you'll want to add to your calendar to wrap up the summer: ELEVATION 002.

On Sunday, September 4, 2022, get ready to experience two of the most praised worlds of dance music colliding at Montreal's Olympic Stadium (East Hall). Whether you're a trance or techno enthusiast, you'll never have to choose between the two genres as the organizers have created two distinct rooms for all to enjoy.

The trance stage will welcome the likes of the legendary Armin van Buuren, MarLo, Nifra, Ruben De Ronde, kärl k-otik and the recently announced Aly & Fila. Taking the decks at the techno stage will be the acclaimed superstar Boris Brejcha, Ann Clue, Moritz Hofbauer, HNTR, Kev Sunshine, Mike Larry, and Uppercut.

Be sure to wear your dancing shoes as these incredible artists will play until the event's end at 6:00AM! That's right, you'll be able to soak in all of this good music until the sun comes up! Plus, if you're anything like us, you'll be bouncing from stage to stage - comfortable footwear is key... 

Earlier this year, we had the pleasure of attending evenko, NEON, and Loud X Clear's first edition of ELEVATION. Although the programming speaks for itself, feel free to check out our exclusive event recap to get a better sense of what to expect here. Trust us, you won't want to miss this soon-to-be epic event!

To secure your spot, make sure to sure to purchase your tickets ASAP here. As you can imagine with an event of this caliber, tickets are flying, including the VIP tickets that are now completely sold out. Therefore, don't sleep on getting your GA tickets before it's too late!

We are looking forward to seeing you on the dancefloor, Flag fam! If you haven't had the chance to experience the first edition of ELEVATION, we're truly ecstatic for you to see what the organizers have in store... We are dreaming of how they'll top the last event - we're positive we'll all be pleasantly surprised!

 

Written By Brittany Prevost
